body:
Hey everyone, Just wanted a little input on your favorite Avicus map.
Mine is The Village (walls) and Venomous TDM (nebula). If anyone has any input please comment below!!!

title: What's your favorite Avicus Map?

replies.body:
I don't really have a favorite map since I don't know them all (some gamemodes don't have enough people playing so I can't see their maps).

Though even with this being a little off topic I think it fits on this thread quite nicely. I am planning on doing some updates with Clay Wars so if you like the map, be hyped and if you dislike it it would be great if you could tell me why (not on the thread though as it will be off topic and I probably won't see it. check my profile for contact methods).

replies.body:
Favorite?

I like pretty much all of the avicus maps. If I would have one favorite map, it would have to be Senex II. I just love the pvp room on that map.. and that it is not too OP.
